title: Diversity of a Devastated Landscape

author: Stefan Anđus, Institute for Biological Research "Sinisa Stankovic" (IBISS), University of Belgrade

segmentation: Hi everyone, my name is Steven Andrew San.
I come from the Institute for Biological Research, signature Stankovich in Belgrade.
What do we do as Hydra biologist?
We do many things, but one of our main activities is actually a lot of field work.

Annemiek, revertible, Exampling, then we come to the lab and we do the identification of the species we collected and in the end we put all this data through programs that show us that give us certain indices and with these indices we can assess.
Ecological status of a certain water body.
We actually listen to the pulse of the water bodies and we protect them so.

The boss Skerryvore was and its tributaries was the question and it is a River located in eastern Serbia, which is under immense pressure under Pjanic pressure and with heavy pollution because it's situated near one of the greatest minds in Serbia.

We inspected 10 localities on 6 tributaries along with both Kariva to see to search for this little animals that live in the River and it show us its state and we use the method of kicking sweep with the special macroinvertebrate Nets, which is actually just the sweeping like with the broom searching for these creatures.

What we got as results is that actually there is a lot of interesting insects in the tributaries like caddisflies, mayflies, and stoneflies that actually show that these weavers have fairly good ecological status.

Another very interesting find was this special species of Trichoptera, which is helicops equal, but this quick that is very hard to find and it's rare and protected, protected with according to Serbian legislative.

Conclusion We can say that well, this bowl skerryvore is still dead, but there its tributaries are thriving with life and have very good ecological status and have this high biodiversity and we are doing our best to protect them and we hope that one day, maybe even the boss creeper can become what her tribute are is R. And thank you very much.
